mapper.select: SELECT HEIGHT , WEIGHT , EYESEGHT , COLORBLIND , BLOOD_TYPE AS bloodType, MEDICAL_HISTORY AS medicalHistory, RELIGION , EMP_NO AS empNo, HOBBY , TALENT , REALESTATE, LIFE_LEVEL AS lifeLevel, LIVING , CITIZENSHIP , PERRESI , CTY_NAME AS ctyName FROM HM_PERCONALDATE_INFO where emp_no = #{empNo}
